participant_1.background:
I'd brag about my ability to solve complicated IT problems.
I am content with being a welder and rock climber.
i work as a lifeguard.
I have 2 sisters, but I'm not sure if my car is sentient.
I love listening to classical music while I organize my office supplies on rainy days.

participant_2.background:
I had pizza and a birthday cake, and then I hung out with my friends and family.
I want to live somewhere where I can wear purple all the time and listen to Iron Maiden as loud as I want.
I spent my last birthday volunteering for an environmental campaign.
I love waking up to the sound of my dogs' excited barking.
My favorite thing is to create music, as it allows me to express myself and connect with others.

content.text: It was good! I spent my birthday volunteering for an environmental campaign.
That sounds like a great way to spend your birthday! How did the campaign go?
It went really well! We were able to clean up a lot of trash and raise awareness about the importance of protecting our environment.
That's amazing! I'm glad to hear that you had a positive experience.
Thanks! It was a lot of fun and I'm glad I got to be a part of it.
What's your favorite thing to do on your days off?
I like to spend time with my friends and family, create music, and go for walks in the park.
Those all sound like great ways to spend your time! I love spending time with my family and friends too.
It's important to take time for the people you love.
What's your favorite music to create?
I love to create all kinds of music, but my favorite is probably rock and roll
